entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
